resources.string: "In order to deal with security, authentication of legit users and in turn warning of unauthorized person plays an essential task. This project proposes to design an IOT based Surveillance system based on biometric train in terms of fingerprint which also incorporates lOT functionality for indication of illegitimate users. The proposed system utilizes fingerprint module for authentication procedure and uses electromechanical relay switch to control rotating door locking system for door entrance using Raspberry PI 3 processor. the system also deals with the module of intrusion user can easily select the intrusion area with the help of camera using the IOT based Wi-Fi connectivity using Raspberry PI 3."
